argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_mnfxr | |- -oo e. RR* |
| 2 |  | #P_xmulcom | |- ( ( -oo e. RR* /\ A e. RR* ) -> ( -oo *e A ) = ( A *e -oo ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. RR* -> ( -oo *e A ) = ( A *e -oo ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ 0 < A ) -> ( -oo *e A ) = ( A *e -oo ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_xmulmnf1 | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ 0 < A ) -> ( A *e -oo ) = -oo ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ 0 < A ) -> ( -oo *e A ) = -oo ) |
